name: Bobby Yeung
title: Software Developer
summary: Software developer with ~5 years' experience building highly available, scalable RESTful services and internal platforms for B2B/B2C clients in education and e‑commerce. Experienced in AI/RAG agents, admission systems, digital signage and e‑commerce platforms, covering complex business rules, RBAC, tenant‑level data isolation and 3rd‑party integrations. Strong in TypeScript/PHP, MySQL/PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker and Terraform, with hands‑on cloud deployment, CI/CD and close collaboration with PMs and product teams to deliver stable, performant systems.

description: Architected AI RAG agent with e-commerce integration, implementing knowledge-base ingestion (PDF/Word/image/CSV) with vector search and deployed on AWS using SST/Terraform, delivering personalized health insights and product recommendations.
Built multi-location digital signage CMS platform using NestJS and MySQL, implementing multi-level RBAC and real-time content synchronization to IoT displays with 10-second refresh latency.

Maintained 3+ admission systems with strict multi-branch data separation, delivering RESTful APIs and automation for inventory forecasting, mobile payments, appointment booking, and digital assessments.
Developed complex WooCommerce discount engines handling multiple promotion types, ensuring accurate calculations and optimizing WordPress performance through code refactoring.
Implemented self-hosted GitLab infrastructure with Docker, designed CI/CD pipelines, and established automated backup strategies on AWS EC2.
Replaced legacy systems using TypeScript/PHP, NestJS/Hono, MySQL/PostgreSQL, Docker, and cloud infrastructure, improving system reliability and operational efficiency.
Collaborated with clients and cross-functional teams to gather requirements, conduct impact analysis, and ensure successful deployments while maintaining code quality.
